Articles.Content:
2949: Is this floor numbered right? Or was there a mistake? Or two mistakes?

      /\ 50

Edited January 22, 2022 by Kerb24
There was a mistake.

@Kerb24You were floor 2950.

Floor 2951: A class on reading and editing posts before publishing them is being held on this floor.

floor 2952: a shinto shrine to all the characters i've had to kill off to make a book i'm writing work.

https://www.pinterest.com/pin/435793701428226601/

Floor 2953: Cats. Again. But this time, it's like a pet store with Taylor Swift looking out for them while thinking of easter eggs for her next re-recorded album.

Edited January 22, 2022 by Kerbal Productions
Floor 2954: A post office with many pneumatic tubes going everywhere. You write a letter and post it.
Floor 2955: Carrier pigeons carrying your letter.
Floor 2956: An Aviary Mail Center, this is probably where the Carrier Pigeons carried your Letter on the Previous Floor
Floor 2957: Akagi's friends on the bar
Floor 2958: You see Jeb pressed up against the window breathing heavily right before a long tentacle hits him off!
Floor 2959: Censored stuff. Disgusted, you climb upstairs with your ears covered.
Floor 2960: The Universe Control Panel of xkcd fame. Careful not to touch anything, you continue.
Floor 2961: A comedy bar! You stay for an hour for the laughs, it's exhausting to see nothing funny on the way up.

Floor 2962: It seems as a simply empty room. However, as soon as you do so the floor tilts up, sending you falling down the stairs. Determined to continue your climb, you climb back up. However, a hole opens up in the floor where your standing, causing you to fall down onto the next floor, where another hole appears sending you down to the next floor, etc. After falling for thirty minutes and several thousand floors, you finally reach the very bottom. Undaunted, you start climbing up the stairs to get to the first floor and continue your climb again, but you see an elevator that you somehow never saw before. Filled with triumph, you climb into the elevator, but to your dismay all the buttons above floor 2963 are broken, so the elevator is useless. Resigned to your fate, you press the button and reach floor 2963.

Edited January 28, 2022 by DunaManiac

Floor 2963: You step in to a dark room, you carefully shuffle out, reaching around to make sure you don't run into anything. Suddenly a spot of light appears on the floor ahead. Voices in the darkness beckon you to step in to it. You ask "why?" The voices say "So that we may see the hero that has made it this far." Tentatively you move in to the light and ask "Who are you?" They reply "We are the council of the building. We observe the progress of any who venture up through our floors." "We have watched your journey and shared in your adventures as if you were a Holovision Star." "We have been impressed with all you have done and would like to give you gifts for your journey going forward." Suddenly the room lights up and you are surrounded by people in party hats, there are decorations and a big table with treats and a huge cake. Each in turn shakes you by the hand and congratulates you. You get to enjoy the cake and play party games like pass the parcel. After many hours the party starts to wrap up and you are presented with a bag of holding (you are told it could hold the contents of an entire room and that it is stocked with essentials, including a portable toilet.) They also give you an electronic book called "The Floor Hikers Guide to the Gargantuan" It has big friendly letters on the cover that say "Don't Panic" You thank them for their hospitality and start your way back up.

Floor 2964: A sperm whale falls from the sky. Dodging whale meat, you continue to the next floor.

 

Spoiler

DON'T BREAK THE HITCHHIKER'S GUIDE TO THE GALAXY CHAIN!
Floor 2965: A room full of chains. You find a sword and break through the chains to continue to the next floor.

Floor 2966: You fall through a portal to Magathrea, but then fall into the planet assembly area and return to floor 2966.

Edited January 28, 2022 by Akagi
Floor 2967. Two workers are repairing the floor counter failed on the previous floor.

What broken floor counter? I see no broken floor counter! 

 

Floor 2968: 5,000 elephants tap-dancing. Dodging the massive feet, you continue to the next floor.

Floor 2969

5,000 alligators tap dancing. Or are they crocodiles?

Floor 2970

5,000 cats salsa dancing. What's with all of the dancing?! You head up to the next floor.

Floor 2971.

You consult the The Floor Hikers Guide to the Gargantuan about all the dancing animals.

This time its 5,000 worms doing the tango.

Floor 2972

*Determination to get to the 3,000th floor builds within you*

Edited January 28, 2022 by BekfastDerp13
builds*

Floor 2973

Whatever it is, but it is dancing foxtrot.
Floor 2974 is nothing but the stairs. Confused, you go to the next floor.
